case.name: Betfair Pty Limited v Racing New South Wales (No 8) [2009] FCA 1161 (12 October 2009)

citances.sentence: I accept the claim for legal professional privilege over part of the email as highlighted in pink and green and the draft legislation attached and highlighted green. Document 128 : I accept the claim for privilege. See Betfair Pty Limited v Racing New South Wales (No 8) [2009] FCA 1161. This is the same document the subject of that judgment. Document 129 : These are emails attaching draft legislation and are privileged.
